Package cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.characters

Class Moving

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.Entity
      • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.characters.Moving
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Enemy, PacMan
    public abstract class Moving
extends Entity
    Moving is an abstract class for all different types of moving entities in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Moving

        public Moving​(Handler handler,
              float x,
              float y)
        Constructor of abstract moving class always called by all moving entities present in game. It takes the game handler for having access to the game map and its elements, an x-coordinate and a y-coordinate, which are both absolute in pixels, rather than in map tiles.

        It also sets local variables, such as alive status, speed, x and y-coordinates in map tiles and the bounding rectangle.

        Parameters:
        handler - game handler for accessing other elements of the game
        x - absolute x-coordinate in pixels
        y - absolute y-coordinate in pixels

    • Method Detail

      • move

        public abstract void move()
        General moving method for all moving entities in the game. It has two different implementations, the PacMan's and the enemies'.

      • moveX

        public abstract void moveX()
        Sets the x-coordinate for moved entity. It makes no changes, when xMove is 0.

      • moveY

        public abstract void moveY()
        Sets the y-coordinate for moved entity. It makes no changes, when yMove is 0.

      • moveRight

        protected void moveRight()
        Moves the entity to the right if it is possible and sets orientation to RIGHT. When it is not possible to move right, it makes no changes.

      • moveLeft

        protected void moveLeft()
        Moves the entity to the left if it is possible and sets orientation to LEFT. When it is not possible to move left, it makes no changes.

      • moveUp

        protected void moveUp()
        Moves the entity up if it is possible and sets orientation to UP. When it is not possible to move up, it makes no changes.

      • moveDown

        protected void moveDown()
        Moves the entity down if it is possible and sets orientation to DOWN. When it is not possible to move down, it makes no changes.

      • canGoRight

        boolean canGoRight​(int tx)
        Checks the upper and lower right corner of the entity for collisions with walls.
        Parameters:
        tx - x-coordinate of target tile
        Returns:
        true, if there is no collision, false otherwise

      • canGoLeft

        boolean canGoLeft​(int tx)
        Checks the upper and lower left corner of the entity for collisions with walls.
        Parameters:
        tx - x-coordinate of target tile
        Returns:
        true, if there is no collision, false otherwise

      • canGoUp

        boolean canGoUp​(int ty)
        Checks the left and right upper corner of the entity for collisions with walls.
        Parameters:
        ty - y-coordinate of target tile
        Returns:
        true, if there is no collision, false otherwise

      • canGoDown

        boolean canGoDown​(int ty)
        Checks the left and right lower corner of the entity for collisions with walls.
        Parameters:
        ty - y-coordinate of target tile
        Returns:
        true, if there is no collision, false otherwise

      • notAlive

        protected boolean notAlive()
        Gets alive status of entity.
        Returns:
        false, if entity is alive, true otherwise
